item.title: Silent Hill 2 remake now available for Xbox Series
item.content:encoded:
• Xbox Series

Available at a 50 percent-off launch discount price.

Publisher Konami and developer Bloober Team have released the Silent Hill 2 remake for Xbox Series via Microsoft Store, the companies announced. The PC version is also now available via Microsoft Store. Both the standard and Deluxe editions can be purchased at a 50 percent-off discount price for a limited time.

Silent Hill 2 launched for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on October 8, 2024. Shipments and digital sales surpassed two million units by January 23, 2025.

The PlayStation 5 version of Silent Hill 2 is also available at a 50 percent-off discount price until December 2 as part of the Konami’s Black Friday offerings.

Here is an overview of the game, via Konami:

About

Having received a letter from his deceased wife, James heads to where they shared so many memories, in the hope of seeing her one more time: Silent Hill. There, by the lake, he finds a woman eerily similar to her…

“My name…is Maria,” the woman smiles. Her face, her voice… She’s just like her.

Experience a master-class in psychological survival horror―lauded as the best in the series―on the latest hardware with chilling visuals and visceral sounds.

Key Features

  • High-end Graphics and Sound – With ray tracing and other cutting-edge technical enhancements, the world of SILENT HILL and its unsettling ambiance is even realer than before. And with the inclusion of new, immersive soundscapes, you’ll feel like you’re standing in the thick of it.
  • Larger Environments – Explore locations and buildings that were once inaccessible, or are newly added in the remake. Enjoy the same acclaimed story, even while you experience the town of Silent Hill with fresh eyes across an expanded map.
  • Over-the-Shoulder Camera – The remake moves from the original’s fixed-camera viewpoints to an over-the-shoulder perspective, putting you closer to what James sees, for a more thrilling, more immersive experience as you explore the town and come face-to-face with monsters.
  • Evolved Combat Gameplay – Familiar weapons like the steel pipe and handgun make their return, but now with an updated combat system. Avoid attacks with carefully timed dodges, aim down sights, and more, making monster encounters more engaging and nerve-wracking then ever.

item.title: Slow life simulation game Japanese Rural Life Adventure coming to Switch, PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Currently available for Apple Arcade.

G-MODE Corporation will release GAME START LLC-developed slow life simulation game Japanese Rural Life Adventure for Switch and PC via Steam, the company announced. A release date was not announced. It will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options, with additional languages also planned.

Japanese Rural Life Adventure first launched for Apple Arcade on September 15, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Japanese Rural Life Adventure is a relaxing slow-life simulation where you can experience the charm of traditional Japanese countryside living, all in a beautifully crafted pixel-art world.

Overview

  • Live in the Japanese Countryside Surrounded by Nature
    • Fix up an old house, make the yard nice, grow your own crops, and become self-sufficient.
    • View the cherry blossoms in the spring;
    • Attend the festival in the summer;
    • Eat roasted sweet potatoes in the fall;
    • Hear the temple bell ring in winter, and then it’s time for the first shrine visit of the New Year.
  • Self-Sufficiency: Hard Work, Deep Flavor
    • Rice—the essential source of energy for the people in Japan.
    • Salt, soy sauce, and miso—seasonings no Japanese kitchen can do without.
    • In this countryside, many things city dwellers take for granted must be made by hand.
    • By standing in the kitchen or cooking around the traditional irori hearth of your heritage home, you can simulate preparing a wide variety of dishes and seasonings.
    • Food made through your own effort tastes extra special.
    • Don’t be surprised if the game makes you hungry!
  • Bring Back Life to the Village Through Various Events
    • Many events unfold depending on the season, location, and time of day.
    • A villager might ask you to repair an old waterwheel, or to help reopen a shuttered candy shop.
    • Strengthen your relationships with the locals and restore the liveliness the village once had.
    • As you complete requests and interact with the villagers, you may earn useful items or unlock new areas to explore.

Systems

Your journey begins as the protagonist, a newcomer from the city, starts a solitary life in an old countryside house.

Start by clearing the overgrown weeds, cleaning the floors, and repairing the “shoji” paper screens.

By the time you’ve completed the tutorial, you’ll have learned the basics of village life.

Each morning, an elderly woman visits to sell daily necessities, and each afternoon, a man arrives to buy items you no longer need. Buy and sell goods as you steadily gather everything required to thrive in the village and complete your missions.

Key Features

  • Grow crops, gather materials, and produce goods to gradually improve your heritage home.
  • Enjoy a wide variety of activities, including fishing and bug catching.
  • Meet many villagers in your new hometown, help them with their troubles, and complete missions to open up new areas.
  • Over 100 hours of total playtime packed with numerous in-game missions.

item.title: Winning Post 10 2026 announced for PS5, Switch 2, PS4, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

Due out on March 26, 2026 in Japan.

Koei Tecmo has announced horse racing simulation game Winning Post 10 2026 for PlayStation 5, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC (Steam). It will launch on March 26, 2026 in Japan.

The PlayStation 5, Switch 2, and PC versions will cost 10,780 yen, while the PlayStation 4 and Switch versions will cost 9,680 yen. The PlayStation 4 version will be digital-only, with the option to upgrade to the PlayStation 5 version for 1,100 yen. Users who purchase the Switch version will not be offered an upgrade path to the Switch 2 version, and save data is not compatible between both versions.

The following pre-order and early purchase bonuses will also be available:

  • Pre-Order Bonuses
    • Famous Horses Filled With Love Options Set – Includes four horses: Hakusetsu, Daitaku Helios, Still in Love, and Loves Only You. This set is not scheduled to be sold at a later date.
    • Pre-Order Bonus Ticket Set – Includes eight special tickets. Tickets included this set will be available for purchase at the same time as the game’s release.
  • Early Bonus
    • Famous Horses That Faced Formidable Rivals Options Set – Includes four horses:: Akane Tenryu , Green Glass, Tap Dance City, and Verxina.
    • Start Dash Set – Includes 500 million yen in-game cash, and one each of gold, silver, bronze, and green charm.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Leave your hoofprints in the latest installment of the horse racing simulation game Winning Post series, Winning Post 10 2026! Become an owner-breeder and experience the drama of the horses and people living in the horse racing world.

Key Features

  • Master the History of Famous Horses and Gameplay of Winning Post – New features include “Cinema Events,” highlighting legendary races that shaped Japanese horse racing, and a “Famous Horse Correlation Chart” showing relationships with era-specific horses. As bonds deepen, racing and reproductive abilities improve. If your horse achieves historic success, you can create a “Yushun Poster” with dynamic layouts and catchy slogans to showcase its personality.
  • Build Your Own “Founder Line” With an Improved Breeding System – “Founder lineage” is now the highest honor in bloodline creation. Beyond bloodline prosperity, the performance of descendants is crucial, making breeding more challenging. New elements like “vitality” and “drama factor” have been added, key to producing legendary horses. The evolved system aims for the ultimate goal of “promoting to the founder lineage.”
  • Enhanced “Strongest Horse Road Online” – A new rarity, “SSR” famous horse cards, has been introduced. These cards feature powerful horses with large “flowering points” for development. Stacking identical cards allows you to “break limits” and greatly boost abilities. Using them in breeding produces even stronger horses.
  • Improved Visual Representation of Historic Horses – The variety of horse equipment has increased, with more detailed visuals of famous horses. Temperament-correcting gear like “pacifier” has been added. Racecourse grass texture now varies by era and season, creating more authentic racing scenes reflecting different periods.
  • Power-Up Elements – Starting from 1968, the oldest scenario, and including the 2020 Triple Crown Showdown, new scenarios are available. The game now features the latest successful horses, new commentary, and a female secretary, enriching the experience for horse owners.

item.title: miHoYo announces Varsapura
item.content:encoded:
Open-world game developed on Unreal Engine 5.

miHoYo has announced Varsapura, its next major open-world game currently in development on Unreal Engine 5. Platforms and a release date were not announced, but the company is recruiting for several game-related roles in both its Shanghai and Singapore offices.

Here are the first details, via miHoYo:

SEAL—Shadow Emergency Alliance.

Internal Directive 047-EX.

All footage was captured from live operational environments (codename: RTX4090). Should you detect any anomalies or interferences, report immediately through secure channels.

Upon entering Varsapura, the protagonist’s appearance shifts to match each viewer’s preferences. The origin of this parapsychological effect remains unknown.

Remain calm. Avoid excessive speculation and maintain composure to prevent Cognosea disruption events. SEAL will continue full-spectrum monitoring.

SEAL has authorized the release of only the English-voice over version at this time, to maintain operational continuity while all available personnel remain assigned to core research initiatives. Additional language modules are in development and will be deployed once system stability is confirmed.

We are currently recruiting individuals with exceptional perceptual acuity and high cognitive stability.

Join SEAL. Make a difference.

item.title: Morkull Ascend to the Gods announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

A sequel to Morkull Ascend to the Gods.

Publisher Dojo System and developer Disaster Games have announced Morkull Ragast’s Rage sequel Morkull Ascend to the Gods for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Dojo System:

About

Morkull Ascend to the Gods is a 2D action video game focused on boss battles, once again taking control of the charismatic God of Death: Morkull.

Set in the original world of Morkull Ragast’s Rage, locked up and aware that he is in a new video game, you must help him escape so that he can carry out his evil plans for the world and rule by subjecting everyone to his will (yes, including you).

You will feel the power and bear the weight of being the God of Death and Darkness. A select series of battles against other henchmen, minions, and Gods that make up the Olympus of the Kingdom of Midaldus await you.

But don’t worry, don’t tremble. You won’t be alone. You’ll have Morkull (or rather, he’ll have you), who has a wide range of combos, skills, and charms that you can unlock, equip, and build to your liking before each battle.

Although you’ll also die a good handful of times.

Morkull is back!

This means that his charisma, character, and personality, along with his breaking of the fourth wall, will create a lighthearted atmosphere at all times (you’re going to need it), loaded with bad jokes, references, and memes that are very present in pop culture.

It’s like having a friend playing alongside you.

Like its predecessor, Morkull Ascend to the Gods is completely hand-drawn and animated, with great care and frame by frame. In this way, thanks to traditional animation, the characters’ movements are very natural and full of life.

Distinguished by a stylized character and a wide color palette, this time, outside of Ragast, you will be able to see and discover other environments that belong to the Kingdom of Midaldus.

Morkull is back! So get back in trouble with him and join his ranks by supporting his Machiavellian cause.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: HITMAN World of Assassination Elusive Target mission ‘Eminem vs. Slim Shady’ launches December 1
item.content:encoded:
IO Interactive has announced HITMAN World of Assassination limited-time Elusive Target mission “Eminem vs. Slim Shady,” which will be available for free from December 1 to 31.

Here are the details:

Eminem vs. Slim Shady: Playable for free starting December 1

Rap icon Eminem joins HITMAN World of Assassination both as himself and his twisted alter ego, Slim Shady. In his latest album, “The Death of Slim Shady,” the rapper attempted to put his other self away, but now Eminem recruits the legendary assassin Agent 47 to put his past away permanently. In a surreal new mission crafted by Eminem in collaboration with IO Interactive and creative director / producer Paul Rosenberg, the level is packed with dreamlike twists that mirror Slim Shady’s unhinged reality. Operatives find themselves in a medical facility in Hokkaido that has been twisted into the Popsomp Hills Asylum. Agent 47 will have to track Slim Shady across multiple areas, such as his broadcasting studio, to take him out without being detected. There are abundant Eminem references in the mission from throughout the rapper’s discography, such as a poisoned plate of the iconic Mom’s Spaghetti and a performance of “Houdini.”

The Season of Eminem vs. Slim Shady: Live Updates, Free for HITMAN World of Assassination Players

A new roadmap will start with the Season of Eminem vs. Slim Shady set to bring new content to players, in addition to the new Elusive Target. Players will be able to face two new challenges, two new Featured Contracts batches, as well as three returning Elusive Targets, including The Splitter featuring Jean-Claude Van Damme, and two returning events: Holiday Hoarders and Hokkaido Snow Festival. Two new Twitch Drops will be available to redeem, with the Bomb-Ass Dynamite, and the Solstice Suit, which can be earned by watching thirty minutes of HITMAN World of Assassination on Twitch during specific time periods.

  • ❮
  • ❯

HITMAN World of Assassination Coming to New Platforms

Alongside the new Elusive Target, IO Interactive announced today that HITMAN World of Assassination will be launching on the ROG XBOX Ally X and ROG XBOX Ally on December 1. The new Elusive Target mission featuring Eminem vs. Slim Shady will be playable day one on these new devices. The game will also be an Xbox Play Anywhere title, allowing players to enjoy seamless play across Xbox consoles and Microsoft PC with shared progress and achievements.

HITMAN World of Assassination is available now for PlayStation 5 with PlayStation VR2 support, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch via cloud streaming, PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, and iOS.

Watch a new trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.
